text.tutorial.welcome1: In this game you will find some
text.tutorial.welcome5: In this tutorial you will learn
text.tutorial.welcome7: If you want to skip it press SPACE.
text.tutorial.welcome8: If you want to see it press ENTER.
text.tutorial.walking_right: Now try to walk. For this you have to press the RIGHT buttton.
text.tutorial.walking_left: And now to the other direction. For this press LEFT.
text.tutorial.sprint: If you want to be faster you can sprint.
text.tutorial.sprint1: For this walk and press SHIFT at the same time.
text.tutorial.item_system: Now try to take a poppy and give it to me.
text.tutorial.item_system1: For this go to a poppy and click on it.
text.tutorial.item_system2: When you can see it in the inventory, come back to me.
text.tutorial.item_system3: Now go through the door by pressing E and follow the next instructions.
text.tutorial.item_system2.0: Please put the flower on the table over there by clicking on it.
text.tutorial.jump2.0: As you can see here you may have to jump in the levels.
text.tutorial.jump2.1: For this press the UP button and walk forward to jump over the water.
